::Battera:;

She looked up at him."I'm sorry but I can't join you. I gave my word 
that I would not leave the ship untill my work here is complete." she 
looked down. "I can't do back on my word. I'm sorry."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> WindRider could sit still no longer. He stood up, and
> transformed again. He hovered in the air a few feet
> above the ground, and motioned for Battera to
> accompany him. He just wanted to fly, and enjoy
> feeling the currents beneath his wings.
